### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15606](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15606.html) ([experimental] UTXO snapshots by jamesob)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

events.message: Change default address type to bech32

Revert "gui: Generate bech32 addresses by default (take 2, fixup)"

This reverts commit fa5a4cd813c2f0225dcbc05cd16ae2d1c0d13234.
Add release note for bech32 by default in wallet

> Could add a commit to bump doc/bips.md (173)?

Please do this in a follow-up PR.

comments.body: I'd prefer factoring out this change from the "Change default address to bech32" commit, because it doesn't seem directly related, but maybe I'm wrong.
IIRC mostly just I'm breaking tests twice and didn't want to bother, let me see if I swap around my commits if it makes it less stupid...
ok, split it up with passing tests for each

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -119,7 +119,7 @@ def run_test(self):
         )
         priv_key4 = self.nodes[0].dumpprivkey(address4)
         self.nodes[1].importprivkey(priv_key4)
-        embedded_addr = self.nodes[1].getaddressinfo(address4)['embedded']['address']
+        embedded_addr = self.nodes[1].getaddressinfo(address4)["embedded"]['address']

@@ -119,7 +119,7 @@ def run_test(self):
         )
         priv_key4 = self.nodes[0].dumpprivkey(address4)
         self.nodes[1].importprivkey(priv_key4)
-        embedded_addr = self.nodes[1].getaddressinfo(address4)['embedded']['address']
+        embedded_addr = self.nodes[1].getaddressinfo(address4)["embedded"]['address']
comments.body: I had removed it, then manually reverted with my favorite quote: the double quote. fixed
